title: Notice of Board Meeting
head_office_address: No. 12 Ihama Road, G.R.A, Benin City, Edo State
meeting_location: 5th floor, AIICO Plaza, Plot PC 12, Churchgate Street, Victoria Island, Lagos
detailed_summary:
### Summary of Corporate Disclosure Document

#### Purpose and Nature of the Disclosure
The document serves as a formal notice for an emergency meeting of the Board of Directors of Ellah Lakes Plc. The primary purpose of the meeting is to discuss the Company’s financing options.

#### Key Dates
- **Meeting Date:** Monday, 8 June 2020
- **Notice Date:** 4 June 2020

#### Meeting Details
- **Time:** 9:00 AM
- **Location:** 5th floor, AIICO Plaza, Plot PC 12, Churchgate Street, Victoria Island, Lagos

#### Company Information
- **Company Name:** Ellah Lakes Plc
- **Head Office Address:** No. 12 Ihama Road, G.R.A, Benin City, Edo State
- **Website:** www.ellahlakes.com
- **Company Secretary:** OAKE Legal

#### Agenda Items
- The main agenda item for the meeting is to consider the Company’s financing options.

#### Regulatory Requirements
The notice complies with corporate governance requirements for notifying board members of an emergency meeting.

#### Conclusion
This document is a formal notification to the Board of Directors regarding an urgent meeting to address critical financial matters for Ellah Lakes Plc.
